short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reports to parents any grooming or exploitative attempts of their children.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sentinel checks child's online activity and interactions. If Sentinel detects inappropriate interaction between a stranger and your child, Sentinel will send parents a text message about it.

If you think your child can't be groomed or manipulated by someone online think again. Child exploitation has risen by 36% over the last 3 years and is getting worse.

Keep in mind this extension is intended for children below the age of 18.
Parents, make sure your child uses only one web browser on the computer.

Works on Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, Vivaldi, Brave and Opera.
